trans-unit.source: Change a window's "Always On Top" attribute.

seg-source.mrk: Change a window's "Always On Top" attribute.

target.mrk: Change a window's "Always On Top" attribute.

trans-unit.source: The title/hWnd/class of the window to change. See Title special definition.

seg-source.mrk: The title/hWnd/class of the window to change.

target.mrk: The title/hWnd/class of the window to change.

trans-unit.source: The text of the window to change. See Text special definition.

seg-source.mrk: The text of the window to change.

target.mrk: The text of the window to change.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the window should have the "TOPMOST" flag set.

seg-source.mrk: Determines whether the window should have the "TOPMOST" flag set.

target.mrk: Determines whether the window should have the "TOPMOST" flag set.

trans-unit.source: 0 if the window is not found.

seg-source.mrk: 0 if the window is not found.

target.mrk: 0 if the window is not found.

trans-unit.source: Third-party programs which add an "Always On Top" context menu entry might not update their menu entry to reflect the AutoIt-induced change in TOPMOST status.

seg-source.mrk: Third-party programs which add an "Always On Top" context menu entry might not update their menu entry to reflect the AutoIt-induced change in TOPMOST status.

target.mrk: Third-party programs which add an "Always On Top" context menu entry might not update their menu entry to reflect the AutoIt-induced change in TOPMOST status.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the handle of the active window.

seg-source.mrk: Retrieve the handle of the active window.

target.mrk: Retrieve the handle of the active window.

trans-unit.source: Set the active window as being ontop using the handle returned by WinGetHandle.

seg-source.mrk: Set the active window as being ontop using the handle returned by WinGetHandle.

target.mrk: Set the active window as being ontop using the handle returned by WinGetHandle.

trans-unit.source: Wait for 2 seconds to display the change.

seg-source.mrk: Wait for 2 seconds to display the change.

target.mrk: Wait for 2 seconds to display the change.

trans-unit.source: Remove the "topmost" state from the active window.

seg-source.mrk: Remove the "topmost" state from the active window.

target.mrk: Remove the "topmost" state from the active window.
